subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: Brian Schottenheimer, the offensive coordinator, and Bill Callahan, the offensive line coach, are leaving the team, which also decided not to retain the receivers coach Henry Ellard.
snippet: Brian Schottenheimer, the offensive coordinator, and Bill Callahan, the offensive line coach, are leaving the team, which also decided not to retain the receivers coach Henry Ellard.
